Text:
You rock! Works perfect. Never did manage to find a mac version of version 4. Now I don't need to.

Note: the keygen is weird with copy and paste. I couldn't use keyboard shortcuts with it. Just right / ctrl click instead
Can someone upload this for PC, please!!
A little confused at first, but once you just read the instuctions it's so simple! Thanks for the great torrent ~
Everything seemed to be okay, except the last step, the activation key, isn't being accepted. What might I be doing wrong? Could it be that the keygen has been caught or expired? I need an adult!
Thanks for the upload, but i cant insert all of the license Authentication digits,,,any help please!!!

MAKE SURE YOU SET YOUR TEXT SIZE TO "SMALLER" ON YOUR COMPUTER OTHERWISE IT WON'T WORK! 

Go to [Screen Resolution] > [Make Text and other Items smaller] >Set to smaller. You will have to log out and sign in again so be prepared. 

And as always, when you make your billion dollars, purchase this program to support the people of worked hard to make it! :)
ari4reel, that's not an available option on Macs. Does anybody know what equivalent would make this thing work?
